languages.text: "Вычищать надо все и с размахом. С тех пор, как на твой мир напали нелюди, на орбите по сей день болтаются остовы погибших кораблей. Зацепи их судами да швырни в гнезда нечисти, что нынче посягает на твою землю!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"
languages.original_text: "Вычищать надо все и с размахом. С тех пор, как на твой мир напали нелюди, на орбите по сей день болтаются остовы погибших кораблей. Зацепи их судами да швырни в гнезда нечисти, что нынче посягает на твою землю!"

traits.locale_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the abhumans have attacked your world, there are the wreckages of the downed ships floating around the orbit everywhere. Hook it up with your ships and send them flying into the eyries of the spawn that is trying to encroach on your land!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the abhumans have attacked your world, there are the wreckages of the downed ships floating around the orbit everywhere. Hook it up with your ships and send them flying into the eyries of the spawn that is trying to encroach on your land!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. Ever since the xenos scum attacked your world, the wrecks of downed ships float everywhere in orbit. Connect them with your ships and send them flying toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

"The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

languages.text: “这场净化必须做得很彻底才行。自从那些异形渣滓袭击了你的世界之后，依然有许多飞船残骸在轨道上四处飘散。让你的飞船负责牵引那些残骸，把它们丢到怪物的巢穴上！”
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: “这场净化必须做得很彻底才行。自从那些异形渣滓袭击了你的世界之后，依然有许多飞船残骸在轨道上四处飘散。让你的飞船负责牵引那些残骸，把它们丢到怪物的巢穴上！”

languages.text: «La purga debe ser exhaustiva. Desde que la escoria xenos atacó este mundo, los pecios de naves derribadas llenan la órbita. ¡Que la flota los recoja y los haga caer sobre los nidos de los engendros que buscan invadir sus dominios!».
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: «La purga debe ser exhaustiva. Desde que la escoria xenos atacó este mundo, los pecios de naves derribadas llenan la órbita. ¡Que la flota los recoja y los haga caer sobre los nidos de los engendros que buscan invadir sus dominios!».

languages.text: 「浄化は徹底的に行うべきだ。ゼノのクズどもが君の惑星を攻撃して以来、撃墜された船の残骸が軌道上のあちこちに浮かんでいる。それらを君の艦隊で拾って、領域に侵入しようとするスポーンの巣に向かって飛ばすんだ！」
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: 「浄化は徹底的に行うべきだ。ゼノのクズどもが君の惑星を攻撃して以来、撃墜された船の残骸が軌道上のあちこちに浮かんでいる。それらを君の船につなぎ合わせて、領域に侵入しようとするスポーンの巣に向かって飛ばすんだ！」

languages.text: « Il faut une purge rigoureuse. De nombreuses épaves tournent encore en orbite depuis que les xénos ont attaqué votre monde. Faites-les remorquer par vos vaisseaux et envoyez-les s'écraser sur les nids de cette vermine qui tente d'envahir votre domaine. »
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: « Il faut une purge rigoureuse. De nombreuses épaves tournent encore en orbite depuis que les xénos ont attaqué votre monde. Faites-les remorquer par vos vaisseaux et envoyez-les s'écraser sur les nids de cette vermine qui tente d'envahir votre domaine. »

languages.text: "Die Säuberung muss gründlich sein. Die Wracks einiger Schiffe treiben seit dem Angriff der Xenos auf Eure Welt noch immer im Orbit. Befehlt Eurer Flotte, sie aufzunehmen, und lasst sie auf die Nester dieser Höllenbrut stürzen, die in Euer Reich eindringen will!"
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Säuberung muss gründlich sein. Die Wracks einiger Schiffe treiben seit dem Angriff der Xenos auf Eure Welt noch immer im Orbit. Befehlt Eurer Flotte, sie aufzunehmen, und lasst sie auf die Nester dieser Höllenbrut stürzen, die in Euer Reich eindringen will!"

languages.text: "Arındırmanın kusursuz olması gerek. Parçalanan gemilerin enkazları, zeno pislikleri dünyana saldırdığından bu yana yörüngede süzülüyor. Filona onları ele geçirip topraklarını gasbetmeye çalışan bu yaratıkların yuvalarına doğru yollama emri ver."
languages.original_text: "The cleansing should be thorough. A good few wrecks of dead ships still linger in orbit after the day the xenos scum attacked your world. Command your fleet to pick them up and send them plummeting toward the nests of this spawn trying to encroach on your domain!"

traits.locale_text: "Arındırmanın kusursuz olması gerek. Parçalanan gemilerin enkazları, zeno pislikleri dünyana saldırdığından bu yana yörüngede süzülüyor. Filona onları ele geçirip topraklarını gasbetmeye çalışan bu yaratıkların yuvalarına doğru yollama emri ver."
